Articles.Content:
Game used to run without issue, but now it crashes every time I try to start it and I'm pretty sure I didn't change anything between when it did work and now. I've tried the 32-bit and 64-bit versions and neither worked. Any help would be appreciated. 

output_log.txt in the crash report says "RtlLookupFunctionEntry returned NULL function. Aborting stack walk.<Missing stacktrace information>" near the bottom, does anyone know how to fix that?

I'm not sure if this is the information that is needed or not, and I can't figure out how to attach the whole file so if that's not what is important please let me know what is.
